text: satyanisedhikal parayunnu: "nannal i khur'anilearikkalum visvasikkilla. atinu mumpulla vedannalilum visvasikkilla." i atikramikale avarute nathanre atuttu nirttunnat ni kantirunnenkil! anneramavar parasparam kurrareapanam natattikkeantirikkum. ihaleakatt mardicceatukkappettirunnavar ahanta naticcirunnavareatu parayum: "ninnalillayirunnenkil nannal visvasikalayirunnene
